p.b: FQXHMUP2519F The import process is complete. Some files were discarded.

li.p:
Explanation: The following files are corrupted and were discarded: {0}.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Download the files again and then reattempt to import the files. If the error persists, contact Support.

Explanation: The repository operation failed because there was a communication problem with the Lenovo or IBM download service.

Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No

Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No

If the problem persists, contact Support.

li.p:
Explanation: An internal error occurred obtaining the appliance network address.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Retry the action. If the problem persists, contact Support.

p.b: FQXHMUP5109L Operating system action was not started on the selected devices.

li.p:
Explanation: Internal Error: Unable to spawn the task with Core Task Manager.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response This can occur if:
1. The inventory processes are not complete. It could take up to 15 minutes for the processes to complete. Wait and then retry the firmware update.
2. The managed device is no longer managed. Ensure that the device is correctly managed, and then retry the operation.
If the problem persists, contact Support.

p.b: FQXHMUP5110L Operating system action was not started on the selected devices.

li.p:
Explanation: One or more devices are already in use by one or more jobs.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Retry the operating system action after the other jobs are complete.

p.b: FQXHMUP6010I The packages have been downloaded: [arg1] by user [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] ibm_cmm_payload.bin, ibm_cmm_metedata.xml, ibm_cmm_change.chg.
[arg2] The user that downloaded the packages.

p.b: FQXHMUP6020I The packages have been imported: [arg1] by user [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] ibm_cmm_payload.bin, ibm_cmm_metedata.xml, ibm_cmm_change.chg.
[arg2] The user that imported the packages.

p.b: FQXHMUP6021I The packages have been imported: [arg1]; The packages have been discarded: [arg2] by user [arg3].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] ibm_cmm_payload.bin, ibm_cmm_metedata.xml, ibm_cmm_change.chg.
[arg2] The user that imported the packages.

p.b: FQXHMUP6022I The packages have been discarded: [arg1] by user [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] ibm_cmm_payload.bin, ibm_cmm_metedata.xml, ibm_cmm_change.chg.
[arg2] The user that imported the packages.

p.b: FQXHMUP6030I The packages have been deleted: [arg1] by user [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] ibm_cmm_payload.bin, ibm_cmm_metedata.xml, ibm_cmm_change.chg.
[arg2] The user that deleted the packages.

p.b: FQXHMUP6101I The package [arg1] has been applied by user [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] Lenovo xClarity Administration Fix Pack 2
[arg2] The user that performed the update.

p.b: FQXHMUP6101J The request to update the application by user [arg1] failed with return code [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] The user that performed the update.
[arg2] The return code from the failed attempt to update.

plentry.pd: Try again. If multiple failures occurred, contact Lenovo Support.

p.b: FQXHMUP6102J The request to update the application by user [arg1] failed with return code [arg2].
Explanation:

pd.p: [arg1] The user that performed the update
[arg2] The result of the application update.

p.b: FQXHMUP6103F The request to update the application by user {0} completed with return code {1}. The requested update is not applicable.

li.p:
Explanation: The application is not compatible with the current version of the management server. View the console output to see the version information.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response

p.b: FQXHMUP7500I Repository operation completed successfully.

li.p:
Explanation: Repository operation completed successfully.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7501L The update package does not contain any applicable machine types.

li.p:
Explanation: The node 'applicableMachineTypes' should have a list of correctly defined machine types.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Download a correct update package from the Lenovo Support website.

p.b: FQXHMUP7502L Update package does not contain any applicable Machine Types Models.

li.p:
Explanation: The node 'machineTypeModel' should have a list of at least one MTM.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Download a correct update package from the Lenovo Support website.

p.b: FQXHMUP7503F At least one of the parsed parameters encountered a non-fatal error.

li.p:
Explanation: One or more parsed parameters was either invalid or missing.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Check the log file for details.

p.b: FQXHMUP7520F The verification task was not attempted.

li.p:
Explanation: The task either does not apply or was not attempted because a previous check failed.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Check the log file for details.

p.b: FQXHMUP7521I The switch has network connectivity.

li.p:
Explanation: An SNMP session could not be established to the switch. This might happen when SNMP is not running on the switch, there is no IP connectivity, there is no L2 connectivity, a power issue occurred, or a hardware failure occurred.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7521L The verification task found that the switch does not have network connectivity.

li.p:
Explanation: An SNMP session could not be established to the switch. This might happen when SNMP is not running on the switch, there is no IP connectivity, there is no L2 connectivity, a power issue occurred, or a hardware failure occurred.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Ensure that the switch i shown as 'online' on the Switches page.

p.b: FQXHMUP7522I The update package stack type matches the switch configuration.

li.p:
Explanation: Either a standalone update package is targeted on a stacked switch, or a stacking update package is targeted on a standalone switch.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7522L The verification task found that the update-package stack type does not match the switch configuration.

li.p:
Explanation: Either a standalone update package is targeted on a stacked switch, or a stacking update package is targeted on a standalone switch.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Use a matching update package, or change the switch configuration to stacked or standalone mode.

p.b: FQXHMUP7523I The stacked switch is the master switch. The firmware update can be applied.

li.p:
Explanation: The target switch is in a stacked configuration as a member. Its firmware cannot be directly updated.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7523L The stacked switch is a member switch. The firmware update cannot be applied.

li.p:
Explanation: The target switch is in a stacked configuration as a member. Its firmware cannot be directly updated.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Update the stacked setup through the master switch.

p.b: FQXHMUP7524I The firmware signature allows update.

li.p:
Explanation: A switch running firmware that is signed with production key cannot be directly update to a development-signed firmware image.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7524L The firmware is development signed and cannot be applied to production signed switch.

li.p:
Explanation: A switch running firmware that is signed with production key cannot be directly update to a development-signed firmware image.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Use a production-signed firmware image, or update the switch manually using the development-signature update procedure.

p.b: FQXHMUP7525I No other updates are in progress.

li.p:
Explanation: An update is in progress on the target switch. Another update cannot be applied until the current process completes.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7525L Another update is in progress.

li.p:
Explanation: An update is in progress on the target switch. Another update cannot be applied until the current process completes.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Wait for the current update to complete or cancel it (if applicable).

p.b: FQXHMUP7526F The switch firmware version is lower than minimum recommended version.

li.p:
Explanation: The switch's current firmware version is lower than the supported minimum version.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Use another method to update the firmware.

p.b: FQXHMUP7526I The switch has the minimum firmware version that is required to support the update.

li.p:
Explanation: The switch's current firmware version is lower than the supported minimum version.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7527L The switch firmware version is too low and does not support update.

li.p:
Explanation: The switch's current firmware version does not support updates through Lenovo XClarity Administrator.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Update the switch manually to a version equal or greater than the minimum supported version.

p.b: FQXHMUP7531I Update package is compatible for this firmware version.

li.p:
Explanation: Newer versions do not allow management with factory default credentials. Such an update would render the switch unmanageable after it is applied.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7531L Update to CNOS version 10.8.1 or higher is not supported when default credentials are used.

li.p:
Explanation: Newer versions do not allow management with factory default credentials. Such an update would render the switch unmanageable after it is applied.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Change the switch access credentials to a different user name and/or password, update the stored credentials for the switch, and retry the update.

p.b: FQXHMUP7540L The update package is not compatible with selected switch.

li.p:
Explanation: The 'name' node does not denote the same hardware platform as the target UUID.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response use an update package that applies to the target UUID.

p.b: FQXHMUP7560L No update jobs are found for selected switch.

li.p:
Explanation: There is no firmware update in progress or finished for the specified UUID.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response start a firmware update job or query another UUID.

p.b: FQXHMUP7561I The payload files were extracted successfully.

li.p:
Explanation: It is expected that the payload contains two files with 'img' or 'imgs' extention and names containing 'Boot' and 'OS', respectively.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7561L Unzipping payload did not produce expected files.

li.p:
Explanation: It is expected that the payload contains two files with 'img' or 'imgs' extention and names containing 'Boot' and 'OS', respectively.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Verify that the payload file for integrity, and download again in case of failure.

li.p:
Explanation: Querying system variables for SFTP credentials (username, password, IPv4 address) failed.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Restart Lenovo XClarity Administrator.

Severity Error

Automatically notify support No

Explanation: An error occurred while transferring the boot image to the switch.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No

li.p:
Explanation: An error occurred while transferring the boot image to the switch.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No

li.p:
Explanation: There was a problem resetting the switch after successful image transfer.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7565L Resetting the switch failed.

li.p:
Explanation: There was a problem resetting the switch after successful image transfer.
Severity Error
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Restart the switch through the Actions setting in switch detail page or manually.

p.b: FQXHMUP7579I The firmware update on the switch was successful.

li.p:
Explanation: The firmware update on the switch was successful.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7599I Generic Rackswitch firmware update message.

li.p:
Explanation: Generic Rackswitch firmware update message.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7700I The storage update completed successfully.

li.p:
Explanation: The storage update completed successfully.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.

p.b: FQXHMUP7701G The verification task found that the specified storage-management user account does not have permission to access the FTP interface.

li.p:
Explanation: The operation cannot be performed because the storage-management user account does not have permission to access the FTP interface.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Use a user account that has permission to access the FTP interface.

p.b: FQXHMUP7702G The verification task found that the specified package cannot be applied.

li.p:
Explanation: The specified package cannot be applied to the storage device because its version is lower than the current installed version or the package is corrupted.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Ensure that the specified package is more recent than the installed version.

p.b: FQXHMUP7703G The verification task found an issue with the current health status of the storage device.

li.p:
Explanation: Firmware updates can be performed only on devices that report the health state as OK or Normal.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Verify the health status of the storage device, and take appropriate actions to turn the status to OK or Normal.

p.b: FQXHMUP7704G The verification task found that the storage device could not be accessed.

li.p:
Explanation: The operation cannot be performed because of a problem with device connectivity.
Severity Warning
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Ensure that there are no connectivity issues to the device, and perform the operation again. If the problem persists, contact Support.

p.b: FQXHMUP8000I Management server updates operation completed successfully.

li.p:
Explanation: Management server updates operation completed successfully.
Severity Informational
Serviceable No
Automatically notify support No
User Response Information only; no action is required.
